articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Earth's Inner Core May Have Started Spinning Other Way, Study Says - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Researchers say the shift occurs about every 70 years, but experts not involved in the study point to several other theories and say many mysteries remain about the center of the Earth
articles.content:
Paris, France  Far below our feet, a giant may have started moving against us. 
Earth's inner core, a hot iron ball the size of Pluto, has stopped spinning in the same direction as the rest of the p… [+3859 chars]
